Vehicle.Name: AD-15 Modular Multi-Role Starfighter
Vehicle.Description: [H3]Koensayr AD-15 Modular Multi-Role Starfighter[h3] Please see page 62 of the Special Modifications Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: [B]Magnetic Module Rails[b]: Adding or removing an attachment takes 10 minutes and requires a successful [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Mechanics check[b]. Each [SU] reduces time by 1 minute, and each [TH] inflicts 1 system strain on vehicle.
